title: Ionic liquid-based extraction of metal ions via polymer inclusion membranes: a critical review
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SU00297K, Critical Review
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Babafemi Adigun, Bishnu P. Thapaliya, Huimin Luo, Sheng Dai
Ionic liquid-based polymer inclusion membranes enable efficient and selective metal ion transport, utilizing the tunable properties of ionic liquids for sustainable metal separation.
